page.title: 12SPORT AND LEISURE
page.content: The are many amenities for sport and leisure in this area. There is {The {Royal Ashdown Golf Club}as well as The Forest Row Cricket Club,Football Club and Tennis Club.There are many riding stables in the area and riding on the{ {Ashdown Forest }is a popular pastime.The {Weir Wood Sailing Club} holds regular regattas throughout the year and the reservoir caters for wind surfers as well as the dinghy sailors. There are many associations connected with the church such as the Anthroposophical Society which is growing in popularity.As many of the large houses are on large plot, gardening is a popular pastime.For an even greater variety of sport and leisure{East Grinstead}offers a Snooker Hall and{Squash Courts}as well as a variety of country pursuits.
